text: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ

translation.en.sahih: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs [all] praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted.
translation.id.indonesian: Segala puji bagi Allah yang memiliki apa yang di langit dan apa yang di bumi dan bagi-Nya (pula) segala puji di akhirat. Dan Dialah Yang Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.
